Text: Thankyou - Just wanted to see if I really am....

Hi - I'm a dummy looking for instructions on how to use this site. In a search, this thing came out on top - an unreadable file. How do I turn it from 3225655.TPB.torrent into something I can use?
 Thanks

For help on using Bit Torrent, look here:

http://www.dessent.net/btfaq/

http://www.torrentz.net/

http://btfaq.com/serve/cache/1.html

http://www.websitedesignpartners.com/bittorrent.html
Your torrent is slighty paradoxial because to learn how to download a torrent, you must first download a torrent.

The document does not discuss how to download torrents.

It is simply a primer on some of the technical issues dealing with movie files that are made available on the Internet.

Thanks for this upload! I hope it saves me the annoyance of explaining everything to my friends all the time.

Best regards
